title: Missing tournament Riot Points
body:
Hey there,

It has been about a month and a half since the conclusion of this Riot sponsored tournament, was just looking to see if prizes were still on their way or if something has happened.

Thanks!

replies.body:
Hey,

Are you able to provide the link on our events portal?

http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/

Have you been in touch with the events organiser?

Hi Maraudaur,

http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/events/169869 is the event.
I talked to one of the event organisers a while ago and they just assured me it would be on its way.

Thank you!
I'll shoot off some messages and see if I can't find any more info about this for you.
